name: User Story

title: "[User Story]"
labels: user story
assignees: NinjaNas

---

**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]  
       
### Details and Assumptions
* [document what you know]
       
### Acceptance Criteria  
       
```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [the outcome of action is observed]
```
